General.Name: Westag & Getalit AG
General.Description: Westag AG manufactures and sells wood-based products for interior finishing and building construction. The company offers doors, frames, kitchen worktops, windowsills, laminates, direct coatings, coated plywood panels, solid surface materials, sidings, formworks, shuttering panels, industrial floors, and vehicle panels, as well as mineral materials and decorative surfaces. It distributes its products worldwide. The company was formerly known as Westag & Getalit AG and changed its name to Westag AG in August 2021. The company was founded in 1901 and is based in Rheda-Wiedenbrück, Germany. Westag AG is a subsidiary of Broadview Industries AG.
